items.sentence: Tom and Mary were unable to help John do that.
You can judge people by the company they keep.
Tom probably won\'t do what we want him to do.
Tom promised Mary he wouldn\'t ever leave her.
Tom promised that that\'ll never happen again.
Do you think Tom would really want to do that?
Do you think anyone would care if we did that?
Do you think I could ask Tom to do that again?
Do you think Tom has enough money to buy that?
I\'ve decided to take matters in my own hands.
